name: Miniforest
description:
Miniforest About

Miniforest is a RTS/Simulator game where you will create & maintain the creatures that live in it! This game is meant to be played on Windows, Mac (not yet) and Mobile platforms (not yet).

Controls & Basic Mechanics

The main idea is to be able to play with just One Click or One Touch!, but there's also advanced improvements avaliable for both PC & Mobile:

  • Use Mouse ScrollWheel or Shrink/Expand Touch on Mobile to Zoom In/Zoom Out the game!
  • Use Right Click + Drag or Simply Drag on Mobile to Pan the camera around!

The core of Miniforest is to create its creatures & maintain them with your God Points. Those will allow you to create tons of things: Trees, Rains, Lightning Storms, etc.

Future & Personal Thoughts?

I'm doing this game for fun & to adquire more knowledge and experience in videogame creation.

I will update it until I reach my goals on this project (I'll be listing & updating them in the community Dev Posts). If for any reason it has a dedicated community, I'll probably spend more time and update more frequently Miniforest!

Thanks for your attention & feedback!

If you wanna support me & my games check my Instagram (main page) @pacaworks or feel free to donate on itch.io!
